sourcesContent:
<template>
  <main>
    <v-sheet
        :style="`margin-top: ${this.headerHeight}px;`"
      id="scrolling-techniques-2"
    >
      <slot />
    </v-sheet>
  </main>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "TheContent",
  data: () => ({
    presentationCarouselDrawer: true,
  }),
  props: {
    pageName: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
  },
  computed: {
    //@ts-ignore
    headerHeight() {
      //@ts-ignore
      switch (this.$vuetify.breakpoint.name) {
        case "lg":
        case "xl":
          //@ts-ignore
          return this.$vuetify.breakpoint.height * 0.4084;
        default:
          //@ts-ignore
          var height = this.$vuetify.breakpoint.height * 0.1884;
          return height;
      }
    },
  }
}
</script>
